title: Sylvester and Tweety
brief_description: A fabulous collection of classic cartoons featuring the long-suffering Sylvester and his pint-sized, yellow nemesis, Tweety. The complete program of cartoons includes: “Room and bird”, “Hyde and go tweet”, “Catty cornered”, “Aint she tweet”, “Dog pounded”, “Tweet tweet tweety”, “Home tweet home”, “Tweety and the beanstalk”, and “Tweety’s SOS”.
